attributes.action: Calling for the resignation of Mark Garnier MP, Stephen Crabb MP l
attributes.additional_details:
Brexit minister Mark Garnier has admitted calling his secretary “sugar t*ts” and taking her to buy him vibrators in Soho. Caroline Edmonson said Mr Garnier stood outside the shop and sent her in to buy sex aides for his wife and a member of his constituency staff.

Former cabinet minister Stephen Crabb sent sexually explicit messages to a 19-year-old woman who applied to work in his Commons office.
attributes.background: Over the last week or so, it has to come to light that brexit minister Mark Garnier and former DWP secretary Mr Stephen Crabb have been acting in an extremely inappropriate way with woman, who work in Westminster. They have abused there position and power and should resign immediately.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP or Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
